events.message: I received my order last week but the product is not as described and I want to request a refund immediately.
The case has been categorized under Refund as the customer requests money back for the product received.
Support agent John has been assigned to handle the refund request submitted by the customer.
Hello, thank you for contacting support. I understand you want a refund. Could you please provide your order number?
Please share the exact issue with the product and attach any relevant photos if possible to help us process your refund.
My order number is 123456789. The item arrived damaged and does not match the description on the website.
We apologize for the inconvenience. We can initiate a full refund upon receiving the damaged item back. Would you like us to send a prepaid shipping label?
Yes, please send me the prepaid label. I want to return the product as soon as possible.
We have sent the prepaid shipping label to your email. Once we receive the product, the refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm if you were able to return the item and if you received the refund as expected.
I returned the product yesterday and already received the refund. Thank you for your prompt assistance.
The refund case has been closed successfully as the customer confirmed receipt of the refund.
